Class ThemeRenderer

java.lang.Object
game.graphics.ThemeRenderer
public class ThemeRenderer extends Object
Renders visual themes and manages background cycling in the game. Handles theme transitions with fade effects and coordinates background layers.

Features:

  • Three themes: MORNING, SUNSET, MIDNIGHT
  • Automatic theme cycling every 30 seconds
  • Smooth fade transitions between themes (2 seconds)
  • Parallax scrolling backgrounds
  • Theme-specific grass animations

  • Constructor Details

    • ThemeRenderer

      public ThemeRenderer()
      Constructs ThemeRenderer and loads all theme resources.

  • Method Details

    • loadThemeResources

      private void loadThemeResources()
      Loads all background and foreground images for all themes.

    • applyTheme

      public void applyTheme(ThemeRenderer.Theme theme)
      Applies a new theme immediately or starts a transition.
      Parameters:
      theme - the theme to apply

    • update

      public void update(double dt, double scrollDt, AudioManager audioManager)
      Updates theme cycling and transitions. Should be called every frame with delta time.
      Parameters:
      dt - delta time in seconds
      scrollDt - delta time adjusted by speed multiplier
      audioManager - audio manager to switch music (can be null)

    • cycleToNextTheme

      private void cycleToNextTheme()
      Cycles to the next theme in sequence. MORNING SUNSET MIDNIGHT MORNING

    • updateScrollingLayers

      public void updateScrollingLayers(double scrollSpeed, double dt)
      Updates parallax background layers with scroll speed.
      Parameters:
      scrollSpeed - base scroll speed
      dt - delta time

    • getCurrentBackgroundImage

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getCurrentBackgroundImage()
      Gets the current background image for rendering. Handles fade transition if active.
      Returns:
      the current background image

    • getPreviousBackgroundImage

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getPreviousBackgroundImage()
      Gets the previous background image for fade transitions.
      Returns:
      the previous background image, or null if not transitioning

    • getTransitionProgress

      public double getTransitionProgress()
      Gets the fade transition progress (0.0 to 1.0).
      Returns:
      transition progress, or 0.0 if not transitioning

    • isTransitioning

      public boolean isTransitioning()
      Checks if a fade transition is currently active.
      Returns:
      true if transitioning between themes

    • getCloudLayer

      public ScrollingBackground getCloudLayer()
      Gets the cloud parallax layer.
      Returns:
      the cloud scrolling background

    • getMountainLayer

      public ScrollingBackground getMountainLayer()
      Gets the mountain parallax layer.
      Returns:
      the mountain scrolling background

    • getCurrentGrassAnimation

      public Animation getCurrentGrassAnimation()
      Gets the current grass animation.
      Returns:
      the grass animation for the current theme

    • getCurrentTheme

      public ThemeRenderer.Theme getCurrentTheme()
      Gets the current theme.
      Returns:
      the current theme

    • generateGrassTiles

      private void generateGrassTiles(double canvasWidth)
      Generates grass tiles with random frame indices. Creates enough tiles to cover screen width plus buffer.
      Parameters:
      canvasWidth - width of the canvas

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the theme manager to initial state (Morning theme).

    • renderParallaxBackground

      public void renderParallaxBackground(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, double canvasWidth, double canvasHeight)
      Renders the parallax background with current theme. Handles fade transitions between themes.
      Parameters:
      gc - graphics context
      canvasWidth - canvas width
      canvasHeight - canvas height

    • renderForeground

      public void renderForeground(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, double canvasWidth, double canvasHeight, double grassScrollOffset)
      Renders the foreground grass with animation (matching original logic). Uses pre-generated grass tiles with random frame indices.
      Parameters:
      gc - graphics context
      canvasWidth - canvas width
      canvasHeight - canvas height
      grassScrollOffset - current grass scroll offset
